# Vendor Styles

All vendors will be downloaded and imported into this library folder. Every vendor
will have a vendor specific folder with all of the contents inside. Folder structure
would look similar to:

```
ğŸ“‚- vendors
   ğŸ“‚- susy
   |  ğŸ“- language
   |  ğŸ“- output
   |  ğŸ“- su
   |  |- _su.scss
   ğŸ“‚- fontawesome
   |  |- _animated.scss
   |  |- _path.scss
   |  |- _font-awesome.scss
```
